leaf_cluster.task_chain: 组件→组合→执行→测试→复现

unit.unit_name: 模块/组件注册表与生态

tools.name: nextflow-template-repository
tools.one_line_profile: Template repository for creating new Nextflow pipelines
tools.detailed_description: GitHub template repository for creating new barebones Nextflow pipelines, using the Arcadia-Science/nextflow-template cookiecutter template.

tools.name: Nextflow_DSL2_template
tools.one_line_profile: Template for creating Nextflow DSL2 pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Template for creating Nextflow DSL2 pipelines, provided by Australian BioCommons.

tools.name: cromwell-frontend
tools.one_line_profile: Web front-end for the Cromwell job server
tools.detailed_description: A web front-end for the Cromwell job server, including authentication via PAM and rudimentary management of workflow definitions.

tools.name: BiaPy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for building bioimage analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Open source Python library for building bioimage analysis pipelines, designed for generating, manipulating, and analyzing image data.

tools.name: BioContainers Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Curated bioinformatics workflows using BioContainers tools
tools.detailed_description: Bioinformatics curated workflows that use Biocontainers tools, facilitating reproducible analysis.

tools.name: BioFSharp
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics and computational biology toolbox for F#
tools.detailed_description: Open source bioinformatics and computational biology toolbox written in F#. This is the core package containing type models and parsers/writers.

tools.name: SUBATOMIC
tools.one_line_profile: Subgraph Based Multi-Omics Clustering framework
tools.detailed_description: The SUbgraph BAsed mulTI-OMIcs Clustering (SUBATOMIC) framework infers interpretable modules with a specific topology.

tools.name: fluids
tools.one_line_profile: Fluid dynamics component of Chemical Engineering Design Library
tools.detailed_description: Fluid dynamics component of Chemical Engineering Design Library (ChEDL), providing routines for fluid dynamics calculations.

tools.name: dockstore-tool-bamstats
tools.one_line_profile: BAMStats tool wrapper for Dockstore
tools.detailed_description: A repo for the BAMStats command, used as a tutorial and functional tool wrapper for Dockstore.

tools.name: DeepTrack2
tools.one_line_profile: Library for image data pipelines for microscopy and tracking
tools.detailed_description: DeepTrack2 is a modular Python library for generating, manipulating, and analyzing image data pipelines for machine learning and experimental imaging.

tools.name: reat
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Eukaryotic Annotation Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: Robust Eukaryotic Annotation Toolkit for annotating eukaryotic genomes.

tools.name: caper
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell/WDL wrapper for Python
tools.detailed_description: Cromwell/WDL wrapper for Python, designed to simplify running pipelines on various backends.

tools.name: croo
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell output organizer
tools.detailed_description: Cromwell output organizer to help manage and structure outputs from WDL pipelines.

tools.name: snakemake-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake rules and workflows for Metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: Common Snakemake rules and workflows mainly directed towards Metagenomic analysis.

tools.name: redundans
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly of heterozygous/polymorphic genomes
tools.detailed_description: Redundans is a pipeline that assists an assembly of heterozygous/polymorphic genomes.

tools.name: IsoTools
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for Long Read Transcriptome Sequencing (LRTS) analysis
tools.detailed_description: IsoTools is a python module designed for the analysis of Long Read Transcriptome Sequencing (LRTS) data. It provides functionalities for importing aligned reads (BAM), transcript reconstruction, quality control, and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: Neuraxle
tools.one_line_profile: Clean AutoML library for building production-ready deep learning pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Neuraxle is a machine learning library for building clean, production-ready pipelines. It provides abstractions for hyperparameter tuning and pipeline steps, compatible with Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow, facilitating organized ML experiments.

tools.name: NordicESMhub Galaxy Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Galaxy tools for Earth System Modeling
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing Galaxy tool wrappers and definitions maintained by the NordicESMHub, specifically designed for Earth System Modeling (ESM) workflows and climate data analysis.

tools.name: SnakeVision
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Snakemake rule graphs
tools.detailed_description: SnakeVision is a tool designed to visualize Snakemake rule graphs, helping researchers understand and debug complex bioinformatics workflows and dependencies.

tools.name: PurdueRCAC Biocontainers
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized bioinformatics applications for cluster deployment
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerized bioinformatics applications and module definitions deployed in Purdue community clusters. It serves as a registry of scientific software containers facilitating reproducible research.

tools.name: LLMBox
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for implementing and evaluating LLMs
tools.detailed_description: LLMBox is a comprehensive library for implementing Large Language Models (LLMs), offering a unified training pipeline and comprehensive model evaluation tools, suitable for AI research and development.

tools.name: ACES
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow to query small sequences in large genomes
tools.detailed_description: ACES is a bioinformatics workflow designed to query small sequences within a large set of genomes. It integrates BLAST results, multiple sequence alignment, fragment assembly, and phylogenetic tree generation.

tools.name: container-mod
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow to generate modulefiles from container registries for HPC
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool designed to pull containers from public registries and automatically generate modulefiles (Lmod/Environment Modules), facilitating the management of scientific software environments in HPC clusters.

tools.name: UMCU Genetics Nextflow Modules
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Nextflow modules for genetics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A registry of reusable Nextflow modules maintained by UMCU Genetics, providing standardized components for building bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: Hi-C Scaffolding Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Automation of 3D_DNA and SALSA Hi-C scaffolding pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A set of automated pipelines for genome scaffolding using Hi-C data, integrating tools like 3D_DNA and SALSA to facilitate genome assembly improvement.

tools.name: hic-scaffolding-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for scaffolding genome assemblies with Hi-C reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for scaffolding genome assemblies using Hi-C sequencing reads, automating the process of ordering and orienting contigs.

tools.name: FusionGDA
tools.one_line_profile: Gene-disease association prediction model using fusion module
tools.detailed_description: FusionGDA is a model that utilizes a pre-training phase with a fusion module to enrich gene and disease semantic representations encoded by pre-trained language models for predicting gene-disease associations.

tools.name: cstag
tools.one_line_profile: Python module to manipulate and visualize minimap2's cs tag
tools.detailed_description: cstag is a Python module designed to manipulate and visualize the 'cs' tag generated by minimap2, facilitating the analysis of alignment mutations and splicing events.

tools.name: cromwell-client
tools.one_line_profile: Scala client for the Cromwell scientific workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A Scala client library for interacting with the Cromwell workflow engine, facilitating the submission and monitoring of scientific workflows.

tools.name: nf-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Nextflow workflows with BioContainers
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing various Nextflow workflows integrated with BioContainers for reproducible bioinformatics analysis.

tools.name: BioNextflow
tools.one_line_profile: Modules and sub-workflows for Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A collection of reusable modules and sub-workflows for building Nextflow pipelines in bioinformatics.

tools.name: bionode-ncbi
tools.one_line_profile: Node.js interface for NCBI E-utilities
tools.detailed_description: A Node.js module for interacting with the NCBI API (E-utilities) to fetch and process biological data.

tools.name: bionode-seq
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence manipulation library for DNA/RNA/Protein
tools.detailed_description: A Node.js module for manipulating DNA, RNA, and protein sequences, providing stream-based processing capabilities.

tools.name: biowasm
tools.one_line_profile: WebAssembly modules for genomics tools
tools.detailed_description: A project providing WebAssembly ports of popular genomics tools (like samtools, seqtk) to enable client-side bioinformatics analysis.

tools.name: BioWDL RNA-seq
tools.one_line_profile: WDL pipeline for RNA-seq data processing
tools.detailed_description: A BioWDL pipeline for processing RNA-seq data, from FASTQ files to expression measures and variant calling.

tools.name: BioWDL germline-DNA
tools.one_line_profile: WDL pipeline for germline DNA variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A BioWDL pipeline for germline DNA variant calling, processing FASTQ files to produce VCF files.

tools.name: BioWDL tasks
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of reusable WDL tasks
tools.detailed_description: A library of reusable WDL tasks for bioinformatics tools, used to construct BioWDL pipelines.

tools.name: cromshell
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for interacting with Cromwell servers
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface tool for submitting workflows, checking status, and retrieving metadata from a Cromwell server.

tools.name: Cromwell
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow engine for WDL
tools.detailed_description: A scientific workflow engine designed for simplicity and scalability, supporting WDL and CWL, widely used in bioinformatics.

tools.name: cromwell-monitor
tools.one_line_profile: Resource monitoring for Cromwell tasks
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate statistics for Cromwell task calls, including resource utilization and estimated costs (deprecated but functional tool).

tools.name: cromwell-task-monitor-bq
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell task monitoring to BigQuery
tools.detailed_description: A scalable tool for reporting Cromwell task call resource monitoring data directly to Google BigQuery for analysis.

tools.name: cromwell-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Python clients for Cromwell interactions
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python clients and accessory scripts for interacting with the Cromwell workflow engine API.

tools.name: lrma-cloud-utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for GCS, Cromwell, and Terra
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for interacting with Google Cloud Storage, Cromwell, and Terra platforms, facilitating cloud-based scientific workflows.

tools.name: widdler
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for managing WDL workflows on Cromwell
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for executing, managing, and querying WDL workflows on Cromwell servers, providing a user-friendly interface.

tools.name: dockstore-cgpmap
tools.one_line_profile: CWL workflow for PCAP mapping
tools.detailed_description: A Dockstore implementation of the Cancer Genome Project (CGP) mapping workflow using PCAP.

tools.name: dockstore-cgpwgs
tools.one_line_profile: CGP core WGS analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Dockstore implementation of the Cancer Genome Project (CGP) core Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) analysis pipeline.

tools.name: GaussDCA.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate Gaussian Direct Coupling Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Julia module for Multivariate Gaussian Direct Coupling Analysis (DCA) for residue contact prediction in protein families.

tools.name: wdl-cell-ranger
tools.one_line_profile: WDL wrapper for Cell Ranger pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A WDL workflow for running Cell Ranger pipelines (10x Genomics) using Cromwell.

tools.name: bfx-tools-wdl
tools.one_line_profile: WDL tasks for bioinformatics tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of WDL tasks wrapping commonly used bioinformatics (BFX) tools for workflow construction.

tools.name: rhea
tools.one_line_profile: RAG+MCP tool server for Galaxy Toolshed
tools.detailed_description: A tool server integrating RAG and MCP capabilities into the Galaxy Toolshed, enhancing the scientific workflow platform with AI agents.

tools.name: worcs
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for Open Reproducible Code in Science
tools.detailed_description: An R package and project template providing a workflow and convenience functions for creating open and reproducible scientific code.

tools.name: active_sciencing
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for active learning and likelihood-free inference in physics
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing reusable workflows and code for active learning and likelihood-free inference, primarily aimed at high-energy physics applications.

tools.name: CEMiTool
tools.one_line_profile: Co-Expression Module Identification Tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the identification and analysis of co-expression modules in transcriptomic data, integrating gene set enrichment and interaction network analysis.

tools.name: CK Autotuning
tools.one_line_profile: Collective Knowledge workflows for program autotuning and benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: Automation actions and reusable workflows for reproducible benchmarking, optimization, and hardware/software co-design within the Collective Knowledge framework.

tools.name: CK Env
tools.one_line_profile: Environment management components for Collective Knowledge workflows
tools.detailed_description: Components and automation actions to enable portable workflows across diverse platforms, handling software detection and environment setup for scientific experiments.

tools.name: CK TensorFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Collective Knowledge components and workflows for TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: Reusable components (code, datasets, models) and workflows for benchmarking and optimizing TensorFlow workloads within the CK framework.

tools.name: DDBJ Workflow Registry
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow registry maintained by DNA Data Bank of Japan
tools.detailed_description: A registry repository containing scientific workflow definitions published by the DNA Data Bank of Japan (DDBJ) for bioinformatics analysis.

tools.name: WMCore
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management core for CMS experiment
tools.detailed_description: Core workflow management components used by the CMS (Compact Muon Solenoid) experiment at CERN for handling large-scale physics data processing.

tools.name: Dockstore
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for sharing scientific tools and workflows
tools.detailed_description: An open platform used by the GA4GH community for sharing Docker-based scientific tools and workflows (CWL, WDL, Nextflow) to ensure reproducibility.

tools.name: eFlows4HPC Workflow Registry
tools.one_line_profile: Registry for HPC workflow descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A registry developed by the eFlows4HPC project to store and manage workflow descriptions for High Performance Computing environments.

tools.name: supereight
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance volumetric SLAM pipeline and octree library
tools.detailed_description: A dense volumetric SLAM pipeline implementation and template octree library for efficient 3D mapping and spatial analysis.

tools.name: WDL Workspace
tools.one_line_profile: Web UI for running WDL bioinformatics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A web-based user interface developed by EPAM to manage and execute WDL bioinformatics workflows using the Cromwell server.

tools.name: MrBiomics
tools.one_line_profile: Modular bioinformatics workflow framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework of composable modules and recipes to automate bioinformatics for multi-omics analyses, serving as the core for various specialized pipelines.

tools.name: atacseq_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: ATAC-seq data processing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for ATAC-seq data processing, quantification, and annotation.

tools.name: dea_limma
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis workflow using Limma
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing differential expression analyses of NGS data using the R package limma.

tools.name: dea_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell differential expression analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing differential expression analyses on single-cell RNA-seq data using Seurat.

tools.name: enrichment_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic enrichment analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing genomic region set and gene set enrichment analyses using tools like LOLA, GREAT, and GSEApy.

tools.name: genome_tracks
tools.one_line_profile: Genome browser track visualization workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for generating and visualizing genome browser tracks from aligned BAM files using pyGenomeTracks and IGV-reports.

tools.name: mixscape_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: CRISPR screen analysis workflow using Mixscape
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for analyzing pooled CRISPR screens with scRNA-seq readout using Seurat's Mixscape method.

tools.name: rnaseq_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq data processing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for RNA-seq data processing, quantification, and annotation.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq processing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for processing and visualizing sc/snRNA-seq data using Seurat.

tools.name: spilterlize_integrate
tools.one_line_profile: NGS count matrix processing and integration workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module to split, filter, normalize, and integrate count matrices from NGS experiments.

tools.name: Seq
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance bioinformatics language/library
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, Pythonic language and library designed specifically for bioinformatics and genomics data processing.

tools.name: fairworkflows
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for constructing and publishing semantic scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that facilitates the construction, manipulation, and publication of scientific workflows using semantic technologies to ensure FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable) principles.

tools.name: Assemble2
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive RNA 2D structure design and 3D module assembly tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows interactive design of RNA 2D structures and the creation/assembly of corresponding RNA 3D modules directly within UCSF Chimera.

tools.name: p3d
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for structural bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python module designed for structural bioinformatics tasks, facilitating the analysis and processing of protein structure data.

tools.name: Galaxy Tools DevTeam
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Galaxy tool wrappers and definitions
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing a set of Galaxy Tools (wrappers and scripts) developed by the Galaxy Team, enabling various scientific analyses within the Galaxy platform.

tools.name: GATK4 CNN Variant Filter
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for filtering variants using Convolutional Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A WDL workflow for filtering genomic variants using deep learning (CNN) models, part of the GATK Best Practices.

tools.name: GATK4 Mitochondria Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for calling variants on mitochondria
tools.detailed_description: A WDL workflow designed specifically for calling variants in mitochondrial DNA, handling the unique characteristics of the mitochondrial genome.

tools.name: GATK4 PathSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detecting microbial pathogens in host sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A WDL workflow for the PathSeq pipeline, which detects microbial pathogens in short-read sequencing data from host organisms.

tools.name: GATK4 Somatic CNVs
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for somatic copy number variation detection
tools.detailed_description: A WDL workflow for detecting somatic copy number variations (CNVs) in tumor/normal sample pairs using GATK4 tools.

tools.name: GATK4 Somatic SNVs Indels
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for somatic SNV and Indel calling
tools.detailed_description: A WDL workflow for calling somatic single nucleotide variants (SNVs) and insertions/deletions (Indels) using Mutect2.

tools.name: snakemake-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of common Snakemake rules and workflows
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing reusable Snakemake rules and workflow templates for bioinformatics and data analysis pipelines.

tools.name: FluentDNA
tools.one_line_profile: Zooming visualization tool for DNA sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for browsing sequence data of any size using a zooming visualization interface, usable as a standalone program or Python module.

tools.name: pybgen
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for reading BGEN genetic data files
tools.detailed_description: A Python module designed to parse and process BGEN (Binary GENetic) files, commonly used for storing large-scale imputed genotype data in genome-wide association studies (GWAS).

tools.name: pyplink
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for reading PLINK binary files
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for reading binary PLINK files (BED/BIM/FAM), which are standard formats for storing genotype data in population genetics and bioinformatics.

tools.name: altocumulus
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool for submitting WDL workflows to Cromwell/Terra
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface designed to facilitate the submission and management of WDL (Workflow Description Language) jobs to Cromwell servers or the Terra platform, streamlining bioinformatics workflow execution.

tools.name: mod_bio
tools.one_line_profile: Apache2 modules for bioinformatics data handling
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Apache2 modules specifically designed for bioinformatics applications, enabling the web server to handle and serve biological data formats directly.

tools.name: pumbaa
tools.one_line_profile: CLI utilities for interacting with Cromwell Server
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool providing utilities to interact with the Cromwell workflow engine server, aiding in the monitoring and management of bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: luslab-nf-modules
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Nextflow modules for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing reusable Nextflow modules developed by Luslab, designed to be integrated into bioinformatics analysis pipelines for various omics data processing tasks.

tools.name: py-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for running nf-core modules
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that allows users to execute nf-core Nextflow modules directly from Python scripts, facilitating the integration of bioinformatics workflow components into Python-based analysis environments.

tools.name: medspacy
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical NLP library using spaCy
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing clinical Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks using spaCy. It includes components for context detection (ConText), section detection, and other clinical text processing needs.

tools.name: CromwellOnAzure
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell workflow engine deployment on Azure
tools.detailed_description: Microsoft Genomics implementation for deploying and running the Broad Institute's Cromwell workflow engine on the Azure cloud platform, enabling scalable bioinformatics data processing.

tools.name: bioGUI
tools.one_line_profile: GUI creator and installer for bioinformatics tools
tools.detailed_description: A framework that allows developers to script graphical user interfaces for command-line bioinformatics applications and provides installation modules for users, simplifying tool accessibility.

tools.name: mskcc-omics-workflows/modules
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow DSL2 modules for MSKCC omics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting Nextflow DSL2 module files containing tool-specific process definitions and documentation, used for building omics analysis pipelines at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center.

tools.name: PyReQTL
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolkit for eQTL analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python modules designed to identify associations between expressed SNVs and gene expression (eQTL analysis) using RNA-sequencing data, equivalent to the R ReQTL Toolkit.

tools.name: MayomicsVC
tools.one_line_profile: Variant Calling Pipeline using Cromwell/WDL
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for variant calling implemented in WDL (Workflow Description Language) and designed to run on the Cromwell execution engine.

tools.name: nf-core/airrflow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for B-cell and T-cell repertoire sequencing analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for Adaptive Immune Receptor Repertoire (AIRR) sequencing data analysis, utilizing the Immcantation framework for processing B-cell and T-cell data.

tools.name: nf-core/ampliseq
tools.one_line_profile: Amplicon sequencing analysis workflow using DADA2 and QIIME2
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for amplicon sequencing analysis (e.g., 16S, ITS, 18S) supporting denoising with DADA2, taxonomic classification with QIIME2, and various quality control steps.

tools.name: nf-core/atacseq
tools.one_line_profile: ATAC-seq peak-calling and QC analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for ATAC-seq data analysis including adapter trimming, alignment, peak calling, and extensive quality control reporting.

tools.name: nf-core/bacass
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial genome assembly and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for simple bacterial genome assembly and annotation, supporting both short and long reads.

tools.name: nf-core/bactmap
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping-based pipeline for bacterial phylogeny
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for creating a phylogeny from bacterial whole genome sequences using a mapping-based approach.

tools.name: nf-core/bamtofastq
tools.one_line_profile: BAM/CRAM to FastQ conversion and QC pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A utility pipeline to convert BAM or CRAM files to FastQ format while performing quality control checks.

tools.name: nf-core/chipseq
tools.one_line_profile: ChIP-seq peak-calling and differential analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for ChIP-seq data analysis, including read alignment, peak calling, quality control, and differential binding analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/circdna
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for extrachromosomal circular DNA identification
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to identify extrachromosomal circular DNA (ecDNA) from Circle-seq, WGS, and ATAC-seq data.

tools.name: nf-core/circrna
tools.one_line_profile: circRNA quantification and differential expression pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the identification, quantification, and differential expression analysis of circular RNAs (circRNAs) from RNA-Seq data, including miRNA target prediction.

tools.name: nf-core/crisprseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analysis of CRISPR edited data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for evaluating gene editing quality from targeted NGS data and discovering genes from CRISPR-Cas9 knockout or activation screens.

tools.name: nf-core/cutandrun
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for CUT&RUN and CUT&TAG experiments
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing CUT&RUN and CUT&TAG data, including QC, spike-in normalization, IgG control handling, and peak calling.

tools.name: nf-core/demultiplex
tools.one_line_profile: Demultiplexing pipeline for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for demultiplexing raw sequencing data (BCL files) into FastQ files, supporting various sequencing platforms.

tools.name: nf-core/differentialabundance
tools.one_line_profile: Differential abundance analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for performing differential abundance analysis on feature/observation matrices, typically from RNA-seq or other omics data.

tools.name: nf-core/diseasemodulediscovery
tools.one_line_profile: Network-based disease module identification pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for identifying disease modules in biological networks, integrating molecular interaction data with disease-associated genes.

tools.name: nf-core/eager
tools.one_line_profile: Ancient DNA analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A fully reproducible pipeline for ancient DNA (aDNA) analysis, handling specific characteristics like damage patterns and contamination.

tools.name: nf-core/epitopeprediction
tools.one_line_profile: Epitope prediction and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for predicting epitopes from sequencing data, useful for vaccine design and immunology studies.

tools.name: nf-core/fetchngs
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to fetch metadata and raw FastQ files
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to retrieve sequencing data (FastQ) and metadata from public repositories like SRA, ENA, and DDBJ.

tools.name: nf-core/funcscan
tools.one_line_profile: Functional gene screening pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for screening (meta-)genomes for functional genes and biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) related to natural products.

tools.name: nf-core/genomeassembler
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read genome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the assembly and scaffolding of haploid/unphased genomes using long reads from Oxford Nanopore or PacBio HiFi.

tools.name: nf-core/hic
tools.one_line_profile: Hi-C data analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the analysis of Chromosome Conformation Capture (Hi-C) data, including mapping, filtering, and contact map generation.

tools.name: nf-core/hlatyping
tools.one_line_profile: HLA typing pipeline from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for precision HLA typing using next-generation sequencing data, supporting various HLA typing tools.

tools.name: nf-core/isoseq
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio Iso-Seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing PacBio Iso-Seq data, generating Full Length Non-Chimeric (FLNC) sequences and genome annotations.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly and binning pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the assembly, binning, and taxonomic classification of metagenomic data to recover Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: nf-core/metatdenovo
tools.one_line_profile: Metatranscriptome/Metagenome assembly and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for de novo assembly and annotation of metatranscriptomic or metagenomic data covering prokaryotes, eukaryotes, and viruses.

tools.name: nf-core/methylseq
tools.one_line_profile: Bisulfite sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for methylation analysis using Bisulfite-Sequencing data, supporting Bismark and other aligners for methylation calling.

tools.name: nf-core/mhcquant
tools.one_line_profile: MHC peptide identification and quantification pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to identify and quantify MHC eluted peptides from mass spectrometry raw data, used in immunopeptidomics.

tools.name: nf-core/modules
tools.one_line_profile: Repository of Nextflow DSL2 modules for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A centralized collection of single-tool wrapper modules for Nextflow DSL2, serving as the building blocks for nf-core pipelines.

tools.name: nf-core/multiplesequencealign
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA) evaluation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to run and systematically evaluate various Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA) methods.

tools.name: nf-core/nanoseq
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Oxford Nanopore sequencing data, performing demultiplexing, quality control, and alignment.

tools.name: nf-core/oncoanalyser
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive cancer DNA/RNA analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for comprehensive cancer genomics analysis, integrating DNA and RNA data for variant calling and reporting.

tools.name: nf-core/pangenome
tools.one_line_profile: Pangenome graph construction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that renders a collection of sequences into a pangenome graph, facilitating pangenomic analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/pathogensurveillance
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogen surveillance pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the surveillance of pathogens using population genomics and sequencing data.

tools.name: nf-core/proteinfold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein 3D structure prediction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for protein 3D structure prediction using tools like AlphaFold2 and ColabFold.

tools.name: nf-core/proteomicslfq
tools.one_line_profile: Proteomics label-free quantification pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for label-free quantification (LFQ) analysis of proteomics data.

tools.name: nf-core/raredisease
tools.one_line_profile: Rare disease variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for calling and scoring variants from Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) or Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) of rare disease patients.

tools.name: nf-core/readsimulator
tools.one_line_profile: Sequencing read simulation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to simulate sequencing reads for various applications such as Amplicon, Target Capture, Metagenome, and Whole Genome data.

tools.name: nf-core/rnafusion
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq gene fusion detection pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the detection of gene fusions from RNA-seq data using multiple fusion detection tools.

tools.name: nf-core/rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: RNA sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A standard RNA-seq analysis pipeline supporting alignment (STAR, HISAT2), quantification (Salmon, RSEM), and extensive quality control.

tools.name: nf-core/rnasplice
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq alternative splicing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for analyzing alternative splicing events from RNA-seq data.

tools.name: nf-core/rnavar
tools.one_line_profile: RNA variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for variant calling from RNA-seq data, following GATK best practices for RNA-seq.

tools.name: nf-core/sarek
tools.one_line_profile: Germline and somatic variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for detecting germline or somatic variants from Whole Genome or Targeted Sequencing data.

tools.name: nf-core/scdownstream
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell transcriptomics downstream analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for downstream analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data, including QC, integration, and visualization.

tools.name: nf-core/scnanoseq
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell Nanopore sequencing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for analyzing single-cell or single-nuclei data derived from Oxford Nanopore and 10X Genomics protocols.

tools.name: nf-core/scrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-Seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing single-cell RNA-Seq data from barcode-based protocols (10x, DropSeq, SmartSeq), including alignment and quantification.

tools.name: nf-core/smrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Small RNA sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the analysis of small RNA sequencing data, such as miRNAs, including trimming, alignment, and quantification.

tools.name: nf-core/spatialvi
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial transcriptomics analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing spatially-resolved gene counts and image data, designed for 10x Genomics Visium.

tools.name: nf-core/taxprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-taxonomic profiling pipeline for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A highly parallelized pipeline for multi-taxonomic profiling of shotgun short- and long-read metagenomic data.

tools.name: nf-core/tools
tools.one_line_profile: Helper tools for the nf-core community to create and manage Nextflow pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing command-line tools to assist in the creation, linting, and management of Nextflow pipelines within the nf-core framework. It ensures adherence to community standards and facilitates the development of reproducible bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: nf-core/variantbenchmarking
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to evaluate and validate the accuracy of variant calling methods
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed to benchmark small variant calling methods in genomic research. It automates the comparison of variant callers against truth sets, generating performance metrics to validate analysis strategies.

tools.name: nf-core/viralrecon
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and intrahost/low-frequency variant calling for viral samples
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics analysis pipeline for viral genomics, supporting assembly and variant calling. It is specifically optimized for handling viral samples, including tasks like consensus sequence generation and low-frequency variant detection.

tools.name: nf-neuro/modules
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow neuroimaging library maintained by the SCIL team
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Nextflow modules specifically designed for neuroimaging analysis pipelines. Maintained by the Sherbrooke Connectivity Imaging Lab (SCIL), it provides reusable components for processing brain imaging data.

tools.name: pyiron/pyiron_base
tools.one_line_profile: Core components of the pyiron IDE for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: The base framework for pyiron, an integrated development environment for computational materials science. It provides the workflow management, job submission, and data storage infrastructure required to run complex atomistic simulations and workflows.

tools.name: refinery-platform/refinery-platform
tools.one_line_profile: Data management, analysis and visualization system for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform for bioinformatics that integrates data repository capabilities with a workflow engine (based on Galaxy) and visualization tools. It facilitates the management and analysis of complex biological datasets.

tools.name: sapporo-wes/yevis-cli
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool to support building and maintaining Yevis workflow registry
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool designed to assist in the creation and maintenance of the Yevis workflow registry. It supports the validation and testing of workflows to ensure they meet GA4GH standards and are reproducible across different environments.

tools.name: scipipe/scipipe
tools.one_line_profile: Robust, flexible and resource-efficient pipelines using Go
tools.detailed_description: A workflow library for writing scientific pipelines in Go. It emphasizes simplicity, robustness, and reproducibility, providing features like automatic audit logging and resource management for complex computational tasks.

tools.name: seandavi/wdlRunR
tools.one_line_profile: Elastic, reproducible, and reusable genomic data science tools from R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to manage and execute WDL (Workflow Description Language) workflows. It allows researchers to run genomic data science pipelines backed by cloud resources directly from an R environment.

tools.name: snakemake-workflows/snakemake-workflow-template
tools.one_line_profile: A template for standard compliant snakemake-workflows
tools.detailed_description: The official template for creating Snakemake workflows that adhere to best practices. It provides a standardized directory structure and configuration setup to ensure workflows are reproducible, distributable, and easy to maintain.

tools.name: snakemake/snakemake-wrappers
tools.one_line_profile: Repository of reusable Snakemake wrappers
tools.detailed_description: A centralized repository of wrappers for common bioinformatics and scientific tools, designed to be easily integrated into Snakemake workflows. These wrappers simplify the process of calling external software and managing dependencies.

tools.name: wdldoc
tools.one_line_profile: Documentation generator for WDL (Workflow Description Language)
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool that automatically generates Markdown documentation from WDL source files, facilitating the maintenance, readability, and sharing of bioinformatics workflows within the scientific community.

tools.name: St. Jude Cloud Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Production-grade bioinformatics workflows for genomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of optimized WDL workflows developed for the St. Jude Cloud project, covering major bioinformatics tasks such as whole-genome alignment, variant calling, and structural variation detection.

tools.name: cromwell-cli
tools.one_line_profile: Command-line interface for the Cromwell workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby-based command-line wrapper for the Cromwell execution engine, designed to simplify the submission, monitoring, and management of WDL/CWL scientific workflows.

tools.name: ALLHiC
tools.one_line_profile: Genome scaffolding tool based on Hi-C data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool designed to scaffold genomes using Hi-C data, specifically optimized for handling the complexity of heterozygous and high-ploidy plant genomes.

tools.name: PetroPy
tools.one_line_profile: Petrophysics and formation evaluation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for processing and analyzing wireline log data (LAS files) to perform conventional and unconventional formation evaluation in geoscience contexts.

tools.name: pyani
tools.one_line_profile: Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI) analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python module and application for calculating Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI) between whole genomic sequences, widely used for the classification and identification of bacteria and archaea.

tools.name: Scaff10X
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for scaffolding genome assemblies using 10x Genomics linked-reads
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to scaffold and break genome assemblies using 10x Genomics linked-reads data. It helps in improving the contiguity and correctness of genome assemblies by leveraging the long-range information from linked-reads.

tools.name: scaffHiC
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genome scaffolding by modelling distributions of Hi-C pairs
tools.detailed_description: A genome scaffolding pipeline that models the distribution of Hi-C pairs to order and orient contigs. It utilizes chromatin interaction data to construct chromosome-scale assemblies from fragmented contigs.

tools.name: bindz-rbp
tools.one_line_profile: RBP module for bindz to detect regulators' binding sites on RNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A specific module for the bindz bioinformatics tool, designed to detect binding sites of RNA-binding proteins (RBPs) on RNA sequences. It serves as a component within the broader bindz analysis framework.
